com.wiris.quizzes.api

Interface QuizzesService


  • public interface QuizzesService
    Wiris Quizzes web service driver.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QuestionResponse execute(QuestionRequest request)
      Makes a remote call to Wiris Quizzes web service and returns its result.
      void executeAsync(QuestionRequest request, QuizzesServiceListener listener)
      Makes an asynchronous remote call to Wiris Quizzes web service.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        QuestionResponse execute(QuestionRequest request)
        Makes a remote call to Wiris Quizzes web service and returns its result.
        Parameters:
        request - The request object built from Quizzes.
        Returns:
        The response object with the results of the call. It may contain the evaluation of a student answer or a set of variable values comming from an algorithm.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Error - In the following cases:
        • If there are more concurrent connections than the value specified in configuration file.
        • ​If an ​​error occurs​ while creating the .lock file needed for synchronized access to max_connections.var file.
        • If unable to load proxy settings.
        • On any network I/O exception.
        • On any unexpected server exception.
        • On any faulty response from server. This indicates checked exceptions such as when there is a timeout executing the algorithm, the kernel is down, etc.
        See Also:
        executeAsync(com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionRequest, com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuizzesServiceListener), QuestionInstance.update(com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionResponse)

      • executeAsync

        void executeAsync(QuestionRequest request,
                QuizzesServiceListener listener)
        Makes an asynchronous remote call to Wiris Quizzes web service.
        Parameters:
        request - The question request built from Quizzes.
        listener - The listener to be called back when the response is available.
